protein.general_function: Involved in sequence-specific DNA binding transcription factor activity
protein.specific_function: Transcriptional activator which binds the cAMP response element (CRE) (consensus:5'-GTGACGT[AC][AG]-3'), a sequence present in many viral and cellular promoters and blocks the differentiation of neuroprogenitor cells into neurons. Its transcriptional activity is enhanced by CCND3 and slightly inhibited by CDK4

go_class.description: sequence-specific dna binding transcription factor activity
